request.description:
To obtain an OAuth token, perform a HTTP POST specifying your clientID and clientSecret in the payload.

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/auth/requestToken.html

To validate an email address, 
perform an HTTP POST specifying the email address and 
validators to be used in the payload of the HTTP POST. 
You can use more than one validator in the same call.

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/address/validateEmail.html

Retrieve a Campaign

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/getCampaign.html

Retrieve a collection of Campaigns

page, pageSize, orderBy available to include in URL.

?$page=1&$pageSize=2&$orderBy=Name ASC

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/getCampaignCollection.html
https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/getCampaignAsset.html

Retrieve all assets associated with a campaign

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/getCampaignAssetCollection.html

Name of the campaign
Description
Campaign Code
Color 
Favorite

{
    "name": "Annual Sale 2012",
    "description": "Yearly sale",
    "campaignCode": "annual2012",
    "color": "0000ff",
    "favorite": false
}

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/createCampaign.html

Associate Asset(s) to an existing Campaign

Options for the array: email, automation_definition, calendar_event, triggered, list, group, data_extension, sendable_custom_object, landing_page, facebook_tab, ct_facebook_post, ct_twitter_post, sms_message, push_message

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/associateAssetToCampaign.html
Delete a campaign by ID

Unassociate an asset from a Campaign

https://code.exacttarget.com/apis-sdks/rest-api/v1/hub/campaigns/unnassociateAssetToCampaign.html

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:a="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:u="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">
   <s:Header>
      <a:Action s:mustUnderstand="1">Update</a:Action>
      <a:MessageID>urn:uuid:7e0cca04-57bd-4481-864c-6ea8039d2ea0</a:MessageID>
            <a:To s:mustUnderstand="1">{{soap_instance_url}}Service.asmx</a:To>
      <fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com">{{access_token}}</fueloauth>
   </s:Header>
   <s:Body xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
      <UpdateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
         <Options />
         <Objects xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI" xsi:type="ns1:QueryDefinition">
            <CustomerKey>Tracking</CustomerKey>
                <Name>Tracking</Name>
                <QueryText>SELECT
   b.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   b.jobid,
   'Bounce' Type,
   b.EventDate,
   b.bouncecategory category,
   b.bouncesubcategory subscategory,
   b.bouncetype Details,
   null Domain 
FROM
   _bounce b 
UNION
SELECT
   c.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   c.jobid,
   'Click' Type,
   c.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   c.URL Details,
   c.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Click c 
UNION
SELECT
   spam.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   spam.jobid,
   'Complaint' Type,
   spam.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   spam.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Complaint spam 
UNION
SELECT
   s.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   s.jobid,
   'Sent' Type,
   s.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   s.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Sent s 
UNION
SELECT
   u.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   u.jobid,
   'Unsubscribe' Type,
   u.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   u.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Unsubscribe u</QueryText>
                <TargetType>DE</TargetType>
                <DataExtensionTarget>
                    <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true" />
                    <ObjectID xsi:nil="true" />
                    <CustomerKey>B391B42A-C386-42D8-9FEA-27409DFA0B29</CustomerKey>
                </DataExtensionTarget>
                <Status>Active</Status>
         </Objects>
      </UpdateRequest>
   </s:Body>
</s:Envelope>

<s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:a="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:u="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">
   <s:Header>
      <a:Action s:mustUnderstand="1">Create</a:Action>
      <a:MessageID>urn:uuid:7e0cca04-57bd-4481-864c-6ea8039d2ea0</a:MessageID>
            <a:To s:mustUnderstand="1">{{soap_instance_url}}Service.asmx</a:To>
		<fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com">{{accessToken}}</fueloauth>
   </s:Header>
   <s:Body xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
      <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
         <Options />
         <Objects xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI" xsi:type="ns1:QueryDefinition">
                    <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true" />
                    <ObjectID xsi:nil="true" />
                    <CustomerKey>#Tracking</CustomerKey>
                    <Name>#Tracking</Name>
                    <QueryText>SELECT
   b.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   b.jobid,
   'Bounce' Type,
   b.EventDate,
   b.bouncecategory category,
   b.bouncesubcategory subscategory,
   b.bouncetype Details,
   null Domain 
FROM
   _bounce b 
UNION
SELECT
   c.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   c.jobid,
   'Click' Type,
   c.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   c.URL Details,
   c.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Click c 
UNION
SELECT
   spam.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   spam.jobid,
   'Complaint' Type,
   spam.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   spam.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Complaint spam 
UNION
SELECT
   s.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   s.jobid,
   'Sent' Type,
   s.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   s.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Sent s 
UNION
SELECT
   u.subscriberkey SubscriberKey,
   u.jobid,
   'Unsubscribe' Type,
   u.EventDate,
   NULL category,
   NULL subscategory,
   NULL Details,
   u.Domain Domain 
FROM
   _Unsubscribe u</QueryText>
                    <TargetType>DE</TargetType>
                    <DataExtensionTarget>
                        <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true" />
                        <ObjectID xsi:nil="true" />
                        <CustomerKey>B391B42A-C386-42D8-9FEA-27409DFA0B29</CustomerKey>
                    </DataExtensionTarget>
                    <TargetUpdateType>Overwrite</TargetUpdateType>
                    <Status>Active</Status>
         </Objects>
      </CreateRequest>
   </s:Body>
</s:Envelope>

            <RetrieveRequest>
                <ObjectType>AccountUserAccount</ObjectType>
                <Properties>AccountUser.AccountUserID</Properties>
                <Properties>AccountUser.Email</Properties>
                <Properties>AccountUser.UserID</Properties>
                <Properties>AccountUser.ActiveFlag</Properties>
                <Properties>Account.ID</Properties>
                <Properties>Account.Name</Properties>
                <Properties>Account.IsActive</Properties>
                <Properties>Account.CustomerID</Properties>
                <Filter xmlns:par="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI" xsi:type="par:ComplexFilterPart">
                    <LeftOperand xsi:type="ComplexFilterPart">
                        <LeftOperand xsi:type="par:SimpleFilterPart">
                            <Property>AccountUser.Email</Property>
                            <SimpleOperator>isNotNull</SimpleOperator>
                        </LeftOperand>
                        <LogicalOperator>AND</LogicalOperator>
                        <RightOperand xsi:type="SimpleFilterPart">
                            <Property>Account.ID</Property>
                            <SimpleOperator>lessThan</SimpleOperator>

                    <RightOperand xsi:type="par:SimpleFilterPart">

                        <SimpleOperator>equals</SimpleOperator>
                        <Value>1</Value>
                    </RightOperand>
                </Filter>
            </RetrieveRequest>
        </RetrieveRequestMsg>
    </s:Body>
</s:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:a="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:u="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">

   </s:Header>
  <s:Body xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">
        <!--
            <Options>
             <SendResponseTo>
          <ResponseType>email</ResponseType>
          <ResponseAddress>your_address@salesforce.com</ResponseAddress>
          <RespondWhen>OnCallComplete</RespondWhen>
          <IncludeResults>true</IncludeResults>
          <IncludeObjects>true</IncludeObjects>
         </SendResponseTo>
             <RequestType>Asynchronous</RequestType>
             <QueuePriority>High</QueuePriority>
            </Options>
        -->
      <Objects xsi:type="TriggeredSend">
          <!-- CANNOT DO WITH TOKEN
                  <Client>
                     <ID>1084813</ID>
                  </Client>
                CANNOT DO WITH TOKEN -->
        <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>
        <ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>
                    <TriggeredSendDefinition>
                      <CustomerKey>ValidationEmail_QA</CustomerKey>
                    </TriggeredSendDefinition>
                    <Subscribers xsi:type="Subscriber">
                      <SubscriberKey>0032500000wubApAAI</SubscriberKey>
                      <EmailAddress>simon.a.schmidt@company.com</EmailAddress>
                      <!--
                      <Owner>
                        <FromName>NTO Support</FromName>
                        <FromAddress>NTO-support@salesforce.com</FromAddress>
                      </Owner>
